mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `T_CLUB` club, `T_SCHOOL` school WHERE school.`SCHOOL_ID` = #{schoolId} AND club.`SCHOOL_ID` = school.`school_id` AND club.`STATUS` = 1

SELECT * FROM `T_CLUB` club, `T_STUDENT_CLUB_GRADUATE_RELATION` student_club, `T_CLUB_GRADUATE` club_graduate WHERE student_club.`STUDENT_ID` = #{studentId} AND club_graduate.`club_id` = club.`club_id` AND club_graduate.`is_current` = 1 AND club_graduate.`club_graduate_id` = student_club.`graduate_id` AND student_club.`is_del` = 0 AND club.`STATUS` = 1

SELECT * FROM `t_student` student, `t_club_graduate` club_graduate, `t_student_club_graduate_relation` stu_clu_relation, `t_club_department` department, `t_club_job` job, `t_school` school WHERE stu_clu_relation.`student_id` = student.`student_id` AND stu_clu_relation.`graduate_id` = club_graduate.`club_graduate_id` AND club_graduate.`is_current` = 1 AND club_graduate.`club_id` = #{clubId} AND stu_clu_relation.`department_id` = department.`department_id` AND stu_clu_relation.`job_id` = job.`job_id` AND student.`school_id` = school.`school_id` AND department.`is_del` = 0 AND job.`is_del` = 0 AND school.`is_del` = 0

SELECT * FROM `t_student` student, `t_club_graduate` club_graduate, `t_student_club_graduate_relation` stu_clu_relation, `t_club_department` department, `t_club_job` job, `t_school` school WHERE stu_clu_relation.`student_id` = student.`student_id` AND stu_clu_relation.`graduate_id` = club_graduate.`club_graduate_id` AND club_graduate.`is_current` = 1 AND club_graduate.`club_id` = #{clubId} AND stu_clu_relation.`department_id` = department.`department_id` AND stu_clu_relation.`job_id` = job.`job_id` AND student.`school_id` = school.`school_id` AND department.`is_del` = 0 AND job.`is_del` = 0 AND school.`is_del` = 0 ORDER BY convert(student.`real_name` USING utf8) COLLATE utf8_bin ASC

SELECT count(student.student_id) AS `count_num` FROM `t_student` student, `t_student_club_graduate_relation` stu_clu_gra_relation, `t_club_graduate` club_graudate WHERE student.`student_id` = stu_clu_gra_relation.`student_id` AND stu_clu_gra_relation.`status` = 1 -- 在职的社团成员 AND stu_clu_gra_relation.`graduate_id` = club_graudate.`club_graduate_id` AND stu_clu_gra_relation.`is_del` = 0 -- 不是被删除的个人 AND club_graudate.`is_current` = 1 -- 社团当前届 AND club_graudate.`club_id` = #{clubId}
SELECT count(club_activity.`club_activity_id`) AS `count_num` FROM `t_club_activity` club_activity WHERE club_activity.`club_id` = #{clubId} AND club_activity.`is_del` = 0

SELECT club.`club_id`, club.`name` AS `club_name`, club.`avatar_url`, club.`level`, club.`introduction`, club.`slogan`, club_graduate.`departments`, club_graduate.`jobs`, stu_clu_gra_relation.`department_id`, stu_clu_gra_relation.`job_id`, stu_clu_gra_relation.`super_admin` FROM `t_club` club, `t_club_graduate` club_graduate, `t_student_club_graduate_relation` stu_clu_gra_relation WHERE club_graduate.`is_current` = 1 AND club_graduate.`club_id` = club.`club_id` AND club_graduate.`club_graduate_id` = stu_clu_gra_relation.`graduate_id` AND stu_clu_gra_relation.`status` = 1 AND stu_clu_gra_relation.`student_id` = #{studentId}
